    • Method Detail

      • setPermission

        public TriggerInfo.Builder setPermission​(String permission)
        Sets the permission that the IntentAgent recipient must have.
        Parameters:
        permission - Indicates the permission to set. This parameter is valid only when the IntentAgent to trigger is intended to send a common event.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder object with the specified permission.
        Since:
        4

      • setIntentParams

        public TriggerInfo.Builder setIntentParams​(IntentParams params)
        Sets custom data.
        Parameters:
        params - Indicates the custom data to set.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder object with the custom data.
        Since:
        4

      • setIntent

        public TriggerInfo.Builder setIntent​(Intent intent)
        Sets a custom Intent.
        Parameters:
        intent - Indicates the custom Intent to set. If the member variable flags of the IntentAgentInfo contains IntentAgentConstant.Flags#CONSTANT_FLAG, this parameter does not take effect. If flags contains IntentAgentConstant.Flags#REPLACE_ELEMENT, IntentAgentConstant.Flags#REPLACE_ACTION, IntentAgentConstant.Flags#REPLACE_URI, IntentAgentConstant.Flags#REPLACE_ENTITIES, and IntentAgentConstant.Flags#REPLACE_BUNDLE, the element, action, uri, entities, and bundleName attributes of the Intent specified in this parameter will be used to replace the corresponding attributes in the original Intent, respectively. If this parameter is null, the original Intent remains unchanged.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder object with the custom Intent.
        Since:
        4

      • setCode

        public TriggerInfo.Builder setCode​(int code)
        Sets the result code provided for the target of the IntentAgent.
        Parameters:
        code - Indicates the result code provided for the target of the IntentAgent.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder object with the specified result code.
        Since:
        4

      • build

        public TriggerInfo build​()
        Creates a TriggerInfo object using all of the settings.
        Returns:
        Returns the created TriggerInfo object.
        Since:
        4
